body_html:
Looks like the bazel script somehow escaped my virtualenv (again: #10529)

I installed wheel on my system and it worked.

@TethysSun: check which python version is used for the command. Also go into the tmp directory and try the command:

python setup.py --help-commands

It should list beside other things:

(...)
Extra commands:
  (...)
  bdist_wheel       create a wheel distribution

Good luck.

body:
Looks like the bazel script somehow escaped my virtualenv (again: #10529)

I installed wheel on my system and it worked.

@TethysSun: check which python version is used for the command. Also go into the tmp directory and try the command:
```bash
python setup.py --help-commands
```

It should list beside other things:
```
(...)
Extra commands:
  (...)
  bdist_wheel       create a wheel distribution
```

Good luck.
